title: Critter Profile: Avocadomilk!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:wilderness]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:wilderness]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div class="wilson-border"]]
[[div class="wilson-header"]]
Critter Profile: Avocado!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Overview!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
[[f<image avocado.jpg width="300px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
**Name:** Avocado

**Species:** Avocado

**Primary Caretaker:** Some Dude

**Diet:** A god does not require sustenance

**Housed:** Your walls.

~~~~~~~
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Creature Features!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Avocado is a... rather strange thing we care for here at Wilson's. We barely know anything about him, heck we don't even know if it's alive. He's an avocado. That's pretty much it. I also think he's really handsome.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
**History!**
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
The Superiors gave us Avocado a few months ago, for who knows what reason. Anyways, they were terrified of him. Absolutely terrified. Petrified even. Sometimes we wonder why. Avocado is, just a regular avocado. We might just end up putting him in the kitchen. Or just eat him. I haven't had guac in a hot minute.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Special Needs and Accommodations!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Avocado does not need to be cared for. He cares for himself. He just sits there. Surprised he hasn't rotted yet.
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Notes about Avocado!
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Another thing, Avocado was dropped off here at Wilson's by some gal. Red hair, about 2 metres tall. Pretty sure she said her name was, Avery Cado. Weird. She was oddly sad to see him go. not like she's an empath or anything like that, but she was acting strange. Anyways, she was in a rush and I think she dropped a note, since I found it in the parking lot. Here it is.

> [[=]]
>
> **Solo SCPs**
>
> [[/=]]
>
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6231 SCP-6231 - Ribbits & Cream]
> 
> //SCP-6231 is a sentient male Agalychnis callidryas (Red-eyed tree frog) that is capable of producing ice cream from its salivary glands.//
> 
> [[=]]
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy-6231-pix VIEW ARTWORK BY IRON SHEARS]
>
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/agente-shuffle-s-art-page VIEW ART BY AGENTE SHUFFLE]
> 
> [[/=]]
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6227 SCP-6227 - Delivery]
> 
> //SCP-6227 is a pizza delivery and order service capable of manifesting pizza at the doorstep of the subject who has ordered.//
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3822 SCP-3822 - Everywhere Yet Nowhere] - Art exchange gift for [[*user Rigen]]
> 
> //Since 2238, those riding on SCP-3822 do not age during their time on the train.//
> 
> -----
> [[=]]
> 
> **Collab SCPs**
> 
> [[/=]]
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5961 SCP-5961 - Under Pressure]  - Collab With [[*user Roundabouts]]
> 
> //SCP-5961 refers to a phenomenon occurring worldwide, consisting of a series of events and the creation of SCP-5961-A.//
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7714 SCP-7714 - Fortunate Souls] - Collab with [[*user TheDarkArtist]] and [[*user SphereFinale]] for the 7000 contest.
> 
> //You have your answers now. I know you will use your expertise in a more lasting manner than I.//
> 
> -----
> 
> [[=]]
> 
> **Tales and GOI Formats**
> 
> [[/=]]
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/what WHAT THE FU-]
>  
> //(Even I don't know how to begin describing this one. Happy April Fools, I guess?)//
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-swift Critter Profile: Swift!]
> 
> //Swift is the name of our lovable and friendly black-footed ferret here at Wilson's.//
> -----
> 
> [[=]]
> 
> **Other Pages**
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/12-days-of-christmas-hub 12 Days of Christmas Hub] - With help from [[*user TheDarkArtist]]
> 
> This is the hub for the Christmas Anthology series I hosted. Special thanks to everyone who contributed!
> [[/=]]

Eh, who cares. This is all just gibberish. They were probably crazy.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user Joreth]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
scp (bad)
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Best avocado since Nikocado
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user TheDarkArtist]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
avocadomilk sent me a message asking for quotes for his author page while i was watching a movie, fuck that guy.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user NebulousStar]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
put words on page gud.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user Cole 13]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Guacamole tastes good. I heard this author makes fantastic guacamole.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user Jackalrelated]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
just stylize it.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user Sirslash47]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
AvocadoMilk makes me have one of the rare moments where I actually like avocado and milk
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: [[*user uncle nicolini]]
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
I will destroy you avocado.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: dado
Recipient(s): Some Dude
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
hello yes avocadomilk good read his things
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="wilson-border" style="margin-top: 7em;"]]
[[div class="wilson-subtitle"]]
Sent by: Some Dude
Recipient(s): Everyone
[[/div]]
[[div class="wilson-body"]]
Who are you people? Stop spamming my email. Fuck you.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

author: AvocadoMilk
